title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Interactive Online Social Education Based on Adult Constructive Development Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and general awareness of social issues
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners enhance critical thinking skills by analyzing and resolving complex social issues in VR simulation environments

Learners will interact with at least three peer learners for two weeks using online collaboration tools such as Slack or Microsoft Teams, contribute opinions at least five times in discussion boards/chat logs, and draft a project plan reflecting diverse perspectives.

Learners will maintain a weekly self-reflection journal for six months, receive at least three feedback sessions monthly from peers/mentors, and demonstrate advancement by at least one stage in cognitive developmental phases (conscious incompetence → conscious competence → unconscious competence → unconscious mastery).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
